snippet.title: Soulash 2 Early Access Adventure Trailer
snippet.description:
Soulash 2 is a unique blend of traditional roguelike, sandbox, and roleplaying genres. It features a procedurally generated open world with simulated history, a skill-based progression system, customizable combat abilities, material-based crafting, building, trading, and the freedom to conquer and plunder.

Soulash 2 is coming to early access in 2023, with the gameplay focused on adventuring. The development direction during early access will concentrate on adding depth to the living world with more ways to interact with it, an army management system that will support the conquest mechanics, and a continuation of the story from the first game.

Wishlist the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2399160/Soulash_2

Join the Discord community to discuss the game:
http://discord.gg/Y2dwG4c

Or, if you enjoy the game development process, check out the devlogs that describe how the game has been built. New devlogs come out every two weeks:
https://www.patreon.com/posts/soulash-2-devlog-66035797


Music by Artur Samociuk: https://soundcloud.com/artursamociuk
Font by Pix3M: https://www.deviantart.com/pix3m/art/Bitmap-font-Romulus-380739406
